info.name: GpxPod
info.summary: Display, analyse, compare and share gpx tracks
info.description:
# GpxPod Nextcloud application
Application to display gpx, kml, igc, fit and tcx files collections, view elevation profiles and tracks stats, filter tracks, color tracks by speed, elevation or pace and compare divergent parts of similar tracks.

This link can be used if the file/folder is shared by public link * ğŸ— allows you to move selected track files * ğŸ— can correct tracks elevations if SRTM.py (gpxelevations) is found on the server's system * âš– can make global comparison of multiple tracks * âš– can make visual pair comparison of divergent parts of similar tracks * ğŸ€† allows users to add personal map tile servers * âš™ saves/restores user options values * ğŸ– allows user to manually set track line colors * ğŸ•‘ detects browser timezone * ğŸ—¬ loads extra marker symbols from GpxEdit if installed * ğŸ”’ works with encrypted data folder (server side encryption) * ğŸ‚ proudly uses Leaflet with lots of plugins to display the map * ğŸ–´ is compatible with SQLite, MySQL and PostgreSQL databases * ğŸ— adds possibility to view .gpx files directly from the "Files" app
